  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3549</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3549</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'edifici de les notes a les línies</string>
            <string language="en">The notes-on-lines building</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anmerkung-auf-Zeilen Aufbauen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les note-sur-lignes construction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As nota-em-linhas construir</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le nota-su-righe costruire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η οικοδόμηση σημείωση-$$$-ΓΡΑΜΜΏΝ</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) que presenta un seguit d'activitats interactives per memoritzar el lloc dels sons de les línies del pentagrama musical. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació (Avalua't) i pràctica (Practica).</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) with a series of interactive activities to help memorize the position of the notes on the staff. It includes self-assessment and practice activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">música</string>
            <string language="en">music</string>
            <string language="es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">audició musical</string>
            <string language="en">music listening</string>
            <string language="es">audición musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) mit 
einer Reihe interaktiven Aktivitäten zum zu helfen, die Position der 
Anmerkungen auf dem Personal sich zu merken. Sie schließt 
Selbstbewertung und Praxisaktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) avec une série
d'activités interactives à aider à apprendre par coeur la position 
des notes sur le personnel. Elle inclut art de l'auto-portrait-assessment et 
activités de pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) com uma série das 
atividades interativas a ajudar memorizar a posição das notas na 
equipe de funcionários. Inclui atividades do self-assessment e 
da prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) con una serie di
attività interattive da contribuire a memorizzare la posizione delle 
note sul personale. Include le attività di pratica e di 
valutazione di se stesso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) με μια σειρά 
διαλογικών δραστηριοτήτων για να βοηθήσει να απομνημονεύσει τη 
θέση των σημειώσεων για το προσωπικό. Περιλαμβάνει τις 
δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης και πρακτικής.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikhören</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écoute de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltare di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
